|bronzeNOC = NOR }} {{Infobox Olympic event |event = Women's Curling |games =

|bronze = Sweden |bronzeNOC = SWE }}

'[[Curling]] at the [[1998 Winter Olympics]]' took place at Karuizawa, who had
hosted the equestrian events at the 1964 Summer Olympics in Tokyo. The 1998
Nagano Olympics marked the second time that curling was held as an official
Olympic sport. It was the first time the same city hosted events for both the
Summer and Winter Olympics.
